brand_identity.name: Just Vitality
brand_identity.theme_strategy: Medical Dark Mode (Deep Slate/Navy base, high contrast data)

usage_rules.headings: Use Plus Jakarta Sans for all H1-H6. Tracking tight (-0.02em).
usage_rules.body: Use Inter for all paragraphs and UI text. Relaxed line height (1.6).
usage_rules.data: Use tabular-nums class for all numerical data in tables and dashboards.

usage_rules.primary: Use for primary actions (Login, Submit), active states, and key brand moments.
usage_rules.success: Use EXCLUSIVELY for Kiosk confirmation steps and positive health indicators.
usage_rules.analytics: Use for charts, graphs, and insight highlights in the Analytics module.
usage_rules.background: Avoid pure black (#000000). Use the deep slate palette for a softer, premium feel.

glassmorphism.usage: Overlays, sticky headers, and modal backdrops.

gradients.usage: Subtle backgrounds for 'Hero' areas only. NO text gradients.

grid_strategy.kiosk: flex flex-col items-center justify-center max-w-2xl mx-auto space-y-8

buttons.primary: bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700 text-white rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium transition-all shadow-lg hover:shadow-blue-500/25
buttons.secondary: bg-slate-800 hover:bg-slate-700 text-slate-200 rounded-full px-6 py-2 border border-slate-700 transition-all
buttons.kiosk_large: w-full h-24 text-2xl font-bold rounded-2xl bg-slate-800 hover:bg-blue-600 hover:text-white border-2 border-slate-700 hover:border-blue-500 transition-all duration-300 flex items-center justify-center gap-4

cards.dashboard: bg-slate-900/50 border border-slate-800 rounded-xl p-6 hover:border-slate-700 transition-colors
cards.kiosk_option: bg-slate-800/80 backdrop-blur-sm border border-slate-700 rounded-2xl p-8 text-center hover:scale-[1.02] transition-transform cursor-pointer

inputs.default: bg-slate-950 border-slate-800 focus:border-blue-500 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-blue-500 rounded-lg h-11 px-4 text-slate-200 placeholder:text-slate-600

launcher_bg.usage: Background for the main Launcher screen with heavy dark overlay (bg-slate-950/90).

login_bg.usage: Split screen background for Login page.

analytics_abstract.usage: Subtle background pattern or card header in Analytics module.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure all text meets WCAG AA standards. Use slate-200 for body text on slate-900 backgrounds.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible focus rings (ring-2 ring-blue-500) on all interactive elements.
accessibility.touch_targets: Minimum 44x44px for all touch targets, especially in Kiosk mode.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Medical Dark' theme using the specified Slate palette.
Use 'Plus Jakarta Sans' for headings to give a modern, trustworthy feel.
For the Kiosk, prioritize large touch targets and clear, step-by-step navigation.
For Analytics, use the 'Bento Grid' layout with the specified purple accents.
Ensure all interactive elements have the 'data-testid' attribute.
Use Shadcn UI components but customize them with the 'Medical Dark' styling (remove default rounded-md, use rounded-lg or rounded-xl).
Do NOT use gradients for text. Keep text solid for maximum readability.
universal_guidelines: Avoid generic 'AI slop' designs. Focus on depth, hierarchy, and 'medical precision'.
Use glassmorphism sparingly but effectively for depth.
Ensure the 'Staff Portal' is dense and data-rich, while the 'Kiosk' is sparse and focused.
Always use the provided image URLs for their respective sections.
